about_the_game:
Background Introduction


The players woke up from an empty room, looking at a pitch black ceiling without knowing where they were. When they got up, they not only found the neutral stone tablet in the room but also saw three other people. The four of them looked at each other and their expressions could also be read. No one knows what happened.
After introducing each other, they looked around the room and also looked at the strangest stone tablet in the room. The tablet was only half a person tall, with an unknown ancient text engraved on it. Below it was a turtle carrying the tablet, and strangely, it stood on three legs. The four of them were all looking around this strange stone monument, and before they could fully understand it, a blue light flashed out. The four of them felt the sky and earth spinning around.
Upon regaining consciousness, they found themselves in a room with no light, surrounded by many messy items. They looked around and found a flashlight, which seemed to be inside a hospital. They carefully opened the room door, and at this moment, a heart wrenching scream came from the room. Everyone's mind was shaken, and the bold person looked towards the direction of the scream. He saw a slightly hunched humanoid creature, as if desperately scratching its stomach, muttering something as it walked deeper.
The next thing to welcome them is the unknown environment and various unexpected situations

Gameplay Introduction


NIGHT CROW is a first person horror decryption game played by 1-4 players. We need to collaborate in different environmental scenarios to complete tasks and unlock the new regulations for the next stage. We have many completely different types of scenes, such as hospitals, ancient houses and courtyards, mysterious caves, and so on. Let's explore the rest on your own Different scenes are accompanied by different terrorist events and different decryption tasks. We hope you can unite and cooperate to solve puzzles, overcome fear, and work hard!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8100 or AMD Ryzen 5 2500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Need microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700 or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Need microphone
